The media was ordered off the area. But with that said, everything they said made it look like it was the Patriots that were firing with rifles, when all the shooting was the FBI snipers and cops. It is heartbreaking how low our country has become. How people are not rallying around this to stop the injustices. As to the other folks, sharpton etc of course they will not be there. #1. Those folks are white. #2. They are Obama henchmen and this is an order from Obama to create this situation. He needs the conflict/civil unrest to declare Marshall law. The race baiting is not working because we, the whites, used words not force to fight back. His time in office is getting shorter and he needs to push harder to progress his agenda.

I truly believe that our Government is trying to divide us .Some might think it sounds crazy but if you divide the population you break it. Thus it is easier for those at the top to have greater control over all of us . Someday soon I believe we will come see the reality of this. United we stand divided we fall. This way how can the masses work together when Uncle Sam becomes totalitarian : a system of government that is centralized and dictatorial and requires complete subservience to the state. Sounds like what DC wants to do to us pawns.
We are no longer a nation of laws for all, it's just over.
